item.title: Upgrading MySQL
item.description: Upgrading MySQL If you want to upgrade your existing MySQL databases, you can follow the procedure below. NOTE: Upgrading may cause some downtime for your database(s) (normally not more than a few minutes). Check your current version(s) To get an overview of the MySQL versions currently running in your cluster, run the following command with the KubeDB CLI: $ kubedb get mysql --all-namespaces NAMESPACE NAME VERSION STATUS AGE ns1 database-ns1 5.
